General.Name: StrongLed Lighting Systems Cayman Co Ltd
General.Description: StrongLED Lighting Systems (Cayman) Co., Ltd., an investment holding company, researches, develops, designs, manufactures, and sells LED lighting equipment in China. The company offers outdoor LED lighting products, including LED flood lights, linear lights, dot pixel lights, and in-ground/underwater lights; and indoor LED lighting products, such as LED wall washers, wall grazers, linear lights, flexible strips, downlights, dot pixel lights, and module lights, as well as smart lighting products, panel lights, and pendant lights. It also provides LED lighting control systems and software; intelligent lighting controllers, touch control panels, and LED lighting circuit expanders; and LED power supplies for indoor and outdoor lighting systems. StrongLED Lighting Systems (Cayman) Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Wujiang, the People's Republic of China.
